channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @mgerber937 How much longer?

item.description: @mgerber937 How does it feel?

item.description: @jh_swanson Who didn’t who arguably should have?

item.description: @shdeen Do you hear this as done by REM or Pete Seeger?

item.description: @DainyBernstein Maybe it’s because I only spent seven years in Litvische yeshivas, but I have never heard of Queen Shushandukht.
item.source:markdown: @DainyBernstein Maybe it’s because I only spent seven years in Litvische yeshivas, but I have never heard of Queen Shushandukht.

item.description: @dzkalman Now democratize the rest of the siddur.

item.description: Really, some of my worst puns ever went into this piece. https://t.co/muinDChTIN

item.description: @DainyBernstein Think I may ban non-trans Welsh from playing rugby on my premises.
item.source:markdown: @DainyBernstein Think I may ban non-trans Welsh from playing rugby on my premises.

item.description: @scalzi “Stupidest possibility” argues for being a dimwit. As does the fact that if he just wanted to sell the secrets he could have taken photos and returned the files upon request.
item.source:markdown: @scalzi “Stupidest possibility” argues for being a dimwit. As does the fact that if he just wanted to sell the secrets he could have taken photos and returned the files upon request.

item.description: @EladNehorai @JustSayXtian Like opiates, it has saved many lives and enhanced many.
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai @JustSayXtian Like opiates, it has saved many lives and enhanced many.

item.description: @EladNehorai @JustSayXtian @TheRaDR @DandiaAsad @pesachology @C_Stroop @AbbyChavaStein @wagatwe @IrMiklat Counterpoint: Twitter lets you have lots of rebbes/teachers, and that’s a good thing. (Gutenberg also offered that, which was also a good thing.)
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai @JustSayXtian @TheRaDR @DandiaAsad @pesachology @C_Stroop @AbbyChavaStein @wagatwe @IrMiklat Counterpoint: Twitter lets you have lots of rebbes/teachers, and that’s a good thing. (Gutenberg also offered that, which was also a good thing.)

item.description: @TheRaDR Counterpoint: vending machines, like all other caffeine dispensing technologies, are a gift from G-d. https://t.co/OKd4NXLOiH
item.source:markdown: @TheRaDR Counterpoint: vending machines, like all other caffeine dispensing technologies, are a gift from G-d. https://t.co/OKd4NXLOiH

item.description: Personally, I’m looking forward to SCOTUS granting my religious freedom to execute NAR Dominionists as false prophets! https://t.co/Qo1DKHEumC
item.source:markdown: Personally, I’m looking forward to SCOTUS granting my religious freedom to execute NAR Dominionists as false prophets! https://t.co/Qo1DKHEumC

item.description: @DBashIdeas Not true. We spent a year on the first daf. #ChofetzChaimMemories

item.description: @dzkalman He’d be a natural!
item.source:markdown: @dzkalman He’d be a natural!

item.description: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber Not if SCOTUS decides that a religious school’s declaration that its education is “sound” must be taken at face value.
item.source:markdown: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber Not if SCOTUS decides that a religious school’s declaration that its education is “sound” must be taken at face value.

item.description: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber Can the state mandate that children attend school on Saturday?
item.source:markdown: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber Can the state mandate that children attend school on Saturday?

item.description: @jdcmedlock Yes. As of a month ago, my Beloved Conservative Relative feared that antifa are the new “Nazi Brownshirts.”
item.source:markdown: @jdcmedlock Yes. As of a month ago, my Beloved Conservative Relative feared that antifa are the new “Nazi Brownshirts.”

item.description: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber Sure they can. Federal first amendment trumps the state.
item.source:markdown: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber Sure they can. Federal first amendment trumps the state.

item.description: @Noahpinion Counterpoint: It coincided with, and partly resulted from, the improvements to life brought by social media.
item.source:markdown: @Noahpinion Counterpoint: It coincided with, and partly resulted from, the improvements to life brought by social media.

item.description: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber I think this all moot, since I expect that one result of the Yeshiva decision will be that secular governments can have no say on religious schools — even as state governments will have to fund them.
item.source:markdown: @ShulimLeifer @hannahofhameln @ShlomoFelber I think this all moot, since I expect that one result of the Yeshiva decision will be that secular governments can have no say on religious schools — even as state governments will have to fund them.

item.description: @EladNehorai Isn’t this just Levinas?
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai Isn’t this just Levinas?

item.description: @trekonomics “They’re on our side, I believe.”
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics “They’re on our side, I believe.”
